      • createSecretHeader

        private static byte[] createSecretHeader(int dataLength)
        Creates the secret header
        Parameters:
        dataLength - length of data to wrap
        Returns:
        an header with padding according to the data length to match encryption container size condition

      • RemoveSecretContainer

        public static byte[] RemoveSecretContainer(byte[] secretContainer)
        Removes the secret container and padding bytes
        Parameters:
        secretContainer - the data with a valid secret container header
        Returns:
        the data without the wrapping container
